author: DryRun
body: HF was missing from hcalcalib PedestalTask plots due to the rounding of nsamples down to a multiple of four (to sample the capids evenly) -- this doesn't work for 3 samples, which gets rounded down to zero. This fix has PedestalTask use all samples for HF if nsamples<4.
title: HCALDQM: Fix missing HF in hcalcalib
